sub_title: Entrepreneur | Supply Chain Manager | Buying Manager
summary:
Goal-oriented team player, initiator, entrepreneur and accomplished problem solving professional with over 10 years experience in Supply Chain & Operations Management. 
Multilingual global citizen with good organizational skills and the necessary knowledge and experience to bring complex and diverse projects to perfect conclusion. 

Through my many intercontinental travels, both personal and work related, I enjoy working in a cross-cultural working environment. 
A positive side effect of traveling and my activities is that I have built up an extensive network of international contacts in the event and entertainment industry and the apparel and fashion industry.
Obviously in my current line of work it is important that I speak and write English fluently. Furthermore I am just as fluent in German and I speak a decent word of Spanish.

My strengths are:
• Management & Leadership
• Problem solving | Decision making
• Forward thinking
• Balanced in responsibility and delegation	
• Stress resilient
• Relationship management
• Enthuse and motivate
• Trouble-shooter	
• Flexible
• Out of the box thinking
• Technical insight
• Enjoy cross-cultural work environments
